summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6137 for the improvement of Inverness Drive from Paisley Drive to Sand Point Way; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by constructing storm sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85377, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
